goal.en: 1. to build the fundamental abilities of measurement and data analysis 2. to cultivate the abilities of logical deduction and report-writing 3. to experience the processes and methods about experimental verification"
goal.ch: 1. 建立量測與數據處理的基本能力 2. 培養邏輯推演與報告撰寫的能力 3. 體驗實驗驗證的過程與方法

content.en:
"experiments as below:
1. Oscilloscope and Multimeter
2. RC circuit
3. Electro-magnetic Induction
4. Michaelson Interference and simple components
5. Atomic spectrum and Plank‘s constant"
content.ch:
1.示波器 and 三用電表
2.RC電路
3.電磁力與電磁感應
4.邁克森干涉與光學
5.原子光譜與蒲朗克常數

textbook.en: Experimental Manuals: edited by department of physics in NCU (will be posted on eeclass)
textbook.ch: 普通物理實驗講義 (will be posted on eeclass system)

method.ch: 講授 研討 實習/實驗

grading.en: "Q & A: 10% Preview report: 20% Exp. report: 30% Quiz: 10% Final exam (writing & doing): 30%"
grading.ch: "平時：10% (含：實驗態度、課堂問/答、講解討論) 實驗預習報告：20% 實驗總結報告：30% 小考：10% 期末考：30% (實際操作)"
